description: ff. 130. 210 x 145; 175 x 125 mm. 18 lin. 14th cent. (a number of missing leaves suppl. by a later hand). Brockelmann, GAL, I, 440 (18: no. 1); S I, 610. Acephalous - on fol. 1a, lin. 2 begins the second ḥadīth: ... روى عن رسول الله ... من کشف عن اخىه کربه
author: Muʻāfá ibn Ismāʻīl, 1156 or 7-1232 or 3.
creator: Muʻāfá ibn Ismāʻīl, 1156 or 7-1232 or 3.
subject: Islamic ethics—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
